BOUM !! The Super Mario Bros. movie is released‚Ä¶ What an incredible adventure it was to bring all those mythical characters we all know since we‚Äôre young alive !!! I hope you‚Äôll all like it. It has been made with passion and respect by the all team of Illumination MacGuff Paris. I want to salute especially the golden animation team I‚Äôve had the honor to work with. What you‚Äôve done‚Ä¶ üòç it‚Äôs just so amazing ! You can be proud of this awesome movie ! What a f‚Ä¶.. great work!!! I‚Äôm so grateful to have lived this journey with you. With my twin brother Ludovic Roz , we just want to say : you rock team !!!
